Elsine's work requires a lot of mana. It wouldn't have been a problem if we had cores, but they're almost impossible to find in places like this.

The good news is that the Cultists near the ruins, such as the {@LinkCreature:24#17#eldritch masters} and {@LinkCreature:24#18#skullcleavers}, have mana. Of course, their mana is tainted with evil, but purifying it is easy. Bring me their mana orbs.

Well, they're not exactly orbs, but hearts. Either way, bring them to me.
Thank youâ€”that can't have been pleasant, but it needed to be done. Please take these hearts to Elsine now.
Did you collect those hearts? You still think you can do it, right?
Allow me to express my gratitude for your diligence. These are just what is required.
